title: How to Stay Productive at Work
headline: Learn practical strategies and tips that will help you stay productive at work with this free online course.
description: We designed this course on workplace productivity to arm you with the knowledge and skills required to maintain a balanced work profile and reputation and help you manage the workplace effectively. We teach you how to measure productivity and provide you with valuable tools and habits to improve it in your workplace. In addition, discover some effective listening and communication skills and manage your stress and anxiety constructively.
courseDescription:
‘Workplace productivity’ refers to the amount of work accomplished in a given amount of time. Employee morale, efficiency and organisational revenues can be affected due to a lack of a productive workplace. We have designed this course to teach you how to create a productive working environment. We begin with a lesson on how to measure and improve workplace productivity. Learn how to set up an office and boost morale by utilising communication and information technology. We've included some helpful communication strategies and some listening and communication skills.

Effective time management is a crucial skill that can help you work efficiently under pressure and achieve your career goals both inside and outside of the workplace. This course will teach you how to organise workloads, overcome procrastination and manage deadlines, which all fall under the umbrella of ‘time management’. Explore the ‘Pareto’ principle of time management and multitasking. Finally, you will learn about workplace conflict resolution and management methods, including anger management techniques. Find out how to deal with anxiety and nervousness using basic strategies.

Conflict management aims to identify and resolve conflicts in a rational, fair and timely manner, thereby improving learning and group outcomes. These include areas of organisational effectiveness or performance and overall workplace productivity. Discover how to handle confrontations professionally and manage your anger successfully. In a nutshell, this course teaches you how to increase workplace productivity, manage your time, overcome procrastination, meet deadlines, communicate effectively and listen attentively. Get started right away and change your working environment for the better!
